flawed_nl_solution:
He has 20/2=<<20/2=10>>10 black socks
So he has 20+10=<<20+10=30>>30 black and red socks
So he has 30*2=<<30*2=60>>60 white socks
So he has 60+30=<<60+30=95>>95 total socks
#### 95

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 95. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
